title: Idol Tenshi Youkoso Youko
original_name: アイドル天使ようこそようこ
opening_song: "Youshun no Passage (陽春のパッセージ)" by Mika Kanai
sinopse: A young girl and her flying squirrel goes to Tokyo in hopes of becoming an idol singer. On the way, she meets another girl who wants to become an actress, and together they work to achieve their dreams. (Source: ANN)
